name: Killing Time (1996)
description: The possible discovery of one lost antiquity is not worth the fate you have tempted. This is one mystery better left undisturbed. But you were foolish and come to the island of Matinicus and the long-abandoned Conway Estate. Now you are trapped in a cursed mansion surrounded by a host of long dead but restless beings. Use your wits and weapons to make your way through the heart of this heinous mystery.
